004package mkt;
005
006/** Broker management */
007public class Broker {
008  /**
009   * Returns total fees of a buy operation.
010   * @param amount: Operation amount.
011   * @return Total fees.
012   */
013  public static double buyFees (double amount) {
014    return (amount > 50000      // broker
015        ? amount * 0.001
016        : 9.75
017      ) +
018      amount * 0.00003 +       // market
019      0.11 +                   // Execution fee
020      amount * 0.004           // tobin + penalty
021    ;
022  }
023
024  /**
025   * Returns net cost of operation (cost + fees).
026   * @param stocks Stocks number.
027   * @param price Stock price.
028   * @return Net cost of operation (cost + fees).
029   */
030  public static double buy (int stocks, double price) {
031    double amount = stocks * price;
032    return amount + buyFees(amount);
033  }
034  /**
035   * Returns total fees of a sale operation.
036   * @param amount: Operation amount.
037   * @return Total fees.
038   */
039  public static double sellFees (double amount) {
040    return (amount > 50000      // broker
041        ? amount * 0.001
042        : 9.75
043      ) +
044      amount * 0.00003 +       // market
045      0.11 +                   // Execution fee
046      amount * 0.002           // penalty
047    ;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Returns net cost of operation (cost - fees).
052   * @param stocks Stocks number.
053   * @param price Stock price.
054   * @return Net cost of operation (cost - fees).
055   */
056  public static double sell (int stocks, double price) {
057    double amount = stocks * price;
058    return amount - sellFees(amount);
059  }
060}
